document.full_text: bp's  annual shareholder meeting was disrupted by campaigners protesting against the oil giant's role in the gulf of mexico spill, while investors registered their disapproval with big votes against directors.
document.title: bp faces angry oil spill protesters at agm
lines_and_colors: bp's  annual shareholder meeting was disrupted by campaigners protesting against the oil giant's role in the gulf of mexico spill, while investors registered their disapproval with big votes against directors.
